name: Northern Guard: Assault
blurb: Northern Guard: Assault > A mobile strategy game featuring superheroes!

rewards.reward: No Reward
Special Thanks:\r\n\r\nAll contributions are accepted with our utmost gratitude.  Your name will be  included in the "Special Thanks" section of the credits as well as listed on our website!

Get the GAME!:

As soon as the game is ready to be shipped we will get a copy into your hands, ready to be played.

Includes:
- Special Thanks

Founder Flag:

This is a unique in-game item that will be included in the game just for you. It will set you apart as a NG:A founding supporter.

Includes:
- Special Thanks
- Get the GAME!

Colour Your Own Adventure:
Get a copy of the NG:A digital colouring book featuring the heroes and villains found in Northern Guard: Assault!

Includes: - Special Thanks - Get the GAME! - Founding Flag

Jam Session: A digital copy of the soundtrack to NG:A, so you can listen to the sweet urban beats not only while you are kicking ass at NG:A, but also while you're kicking ass at the rest of your life! Includes: - Special Thanks - Get the GAME! - Founding Flag

The Continuing Adventures:

Read more adventures of Northern Guard in a 15 page digital comic.

 Includes: - Special Thanks - Get the GAME! - Founding Flag - Colour Your Own Adventure

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL!  Choose any one of the following Alternate Dimension Rewards (Mirror Verse, The Greatest Generation, 1812) and get it for $30. This includes: - Special Thanks - Get the GAME!  - Founding Flag - Colour Your Own Adventure

Alternate Dimension - Mirror Verse:

Who doesn't love an evil alternate dimension. Get alternate costumes for all the members of Northern Guard as though they were from an alternate evil dimension.

Includes:
- Special Thanks
- Get the GAME!
- Founding Flag
- Colour Your Own Adventure
- The Continuing Adventures

Alternate Dimension - The Greatest Generation:

They fought not for fame or glory, but because it was the right thing to do. Get alternate costumes for all the members of the Northern Guard as though they were active in the 1940's.

Includes: - Special Thanks - Get the GAME! - Founding Flag - Colour Your Own Adventure - The Continuing Adventures

Alternate Dimension - 1812:

The War of 1812 was a pivotal moment in the development of both Canada and the United States, but what if...

Get alternate costumes for all the members of Northern Guard  as they might appear if the events of the War of 1812 (aka the second war of independence) had gone a little differently. Exclusive content, both in terms of levels and narrative!

Includes: - Special Thanks - Get the GAME!  - Founding Flag - Colour Your Own Adventure - The Continuing Adventures

EARLY BIRD! Northern Guard PT Gear - T-Shirt: Wear the same PT (physical training) gear that Northern Guard trains in! Well obviously not the same gear, as we are talking about fictional characters, but we will send you a sweet t-shirt. One that they would wear, if they were really real... Includes: - Special Thanks - Get the GAME! - Founding Flag - Colour Your Own Adventure - The Continuing Adventures - Colour Your Own Adventure: The Book

Northern Guard PT Gear - T-Shirt:

Wear the same PT (physical training) gear that Northern Guard trains in! Well obviously not the same gear, as we are talking about fictional characters, but we will send you a sweet t-shirt. One that they would wear, were they really real...

Includes:
- Special Thanks 
- Get the GAME!
- Founding Flag
- Colour Your Own Adventure
- The Continuing Adventures

EARLY BIRD! Northern Guard Heavy Gear - Hoodie: It gets chilly out there; suit up in the official Northern Guard hoodie sweater. Includes: - Special Thanks - Get the GAME! - Founding Flag - Colour Your Own Adventure - The Continuing Adventures

EARLY BIRD! Join the Dev Team: Become an honourary member of our team; we will open the design docs, bug tracking system, and internal forum to you. You will also get the latest weekly build to track our progress. Includes: - Special Thanks - Get the GAME! - Founding Flag - Colour your own Adventure - The Continuing Adventures - PT Gear

Northern Guard Heavy Gear - Hoodie: It gets chilly out there; suit up in the official Northern Guard hoodie sweater. Includes: - Special Thanks - Get the GAME! - Founding Flag - Colour Your Own Adventure - The Continuing Adventures

Get in the GAME:

Be a part of the story, become an in-game NPC! We will strive to have a character bearing your name and/or likeness (or someone of your choice) at an integral moment of the game.

Includes:
- Special Thanks 
- Get the GAME!
- Founding Flag
- Colour your own Adventure
- Jam Session
- The Continuing Adventures

The PM's office:

Not only are you featured in the game (name and likeness), but you are the Prime Minister of Canada!  The fate of the country is literally in your hands… virtually - literally. Also, being the leader of Canada technically makes you leader of Northern Guard, so we'll toss in a T-shirt as well!

Includes:
- Special Thanks 
- Get the GAME!
- Founding Flag
- Colour Your Own Adventure
- Jam Session
- The Continuing Adventures
- Northern Guard PT Gear - T-shirt

Join the Team:

Join an elite team of superheroes, by sending us your hero idea and our team will work with you to get him or her ready for the battlefield as a playable character in Northern Guard: Assault!

Includes:
- Special Thanks 
- Get the GAME!
- Founding Flag
- Colour Your Own Adventure
- Jam Session
- The Continuing Adventures
- The Full Kit

This is your Story:

A customized hardcover comic detailing the decisions and actions you made in your playthrough.

Includes:
- Special Thanks
